name: Bike-feed
tagline: participate in marking bike trails in need of fixing, completion, missing signs, holes, you name it
body:
### Welcome to Bike Feed
Bike feed is short for bike feedback.  We want to encourage citizen / public participation around biking in your community.  This means we want you to participate in identifing problems with the current bike network and infrastructure.  Allow you to help make suggestions as to where new bike routes could be planned or are needed.  Give you the power to identify where problems occur and email the correct Public Official about this problem.

code is open source so please make a branch:

```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```

If you're using the GitHub for Mac, simply sync your repository and you'll see the new branch.

### Bike Route Feedback
We've crafted some handsome templates for you to use. Go ahead and continue to layouts to browse through them. You can easily go back to edit your page before publishing. After publishing your page, you can revisit the page generator and switch to another theme. Your Page content will be preserved if it remained markdown format.

### Bike Route Damage Feedback
Identify where a bike route is damaged such as "Tree Route" or "Pothole" you name it.

### Bike Suggestions
Post your own suggested bike routes.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out the documentation at http://help.github.com/pages or contact support@github.com and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
